alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 5:26PM CDT until May 29 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Duval County in south central Texas... Southwestern Jim Wells County in south central Texas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rios, or 12 miles northwest of Premont, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Premont, Concepcion, Ramirez, Rios and Cruz Calle. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 696 and 700. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
